items.content_html: SimpleSweeper is a lightweight, classic Minesweeper game built with pure JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. It offers a clean, intuitive interface and full game mechanics, showcasing how minimalistic development can create engaging and functional web applications. Perfect for learning, inspiration, or casual play! ðŸŽ®
